examples.example: 人生没有所谓的终点站，我们应一直保持前进的姿态，去追寻梦想。

translate.english: There is no so-called terminus in life. We should always keep the posture of moving forward to pursue our dreams.

examples.example: 无论前方的道路多么漫长，我们都要坚信美好就在下一个转角，而不是把现在当成人生的终点站。

translate.english: No matter how long the road ahead is, we should firmly believe that the beauty is just around the next corner, rather than regarding the present as the destination of life.

examples.example: 每一次旅程都有起点，但我们不应畏惧，因为那不是人生的终点站，而是新的开始。

translate.english: Every journey has a starting point, but we should not be afraid, because that is not the terminal station of life, but a new beginning.
